actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend treatment of certain rents under section 2032A to all qualified heirs.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code with respect to the valuation of farm land for estate tax purposes, permitting a qualified heir to enter into a cash lease of farm or other real property with a family member and still have the property valued under use value principles rather than according to its highest and best use.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend treatment of certain rents under section 2032A to all qualified heirs.
